word_mean: 金属的：包含金属性质的

sentence.Network_en: There was a metallic click and the gates swung open.
sentence.Network_cn: 随着一声金属碰击的咔嗒声，大门打开了。

sentence.Network_en: There was a metallic taste at the back of his throat.
sentence.Network_cn: 他喉咙深处有一股金属味儿。

sentence.Network_en: He had painted all the wood with metallic silver paint.
sentence.Network_cn: 他给所有的木材都涂上了一层闪耀着金属光泽的银漆。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Latin from Greek metallikos, from metallon (see metal)

entry.tran: 金属撞击般的；叮当声的
entry.def: A metallic sound is  like the sound of one piece of metal hitting another.

example.ex: There was a metallic click and the gates swung open...
example.tran: 随着一声金属碰击的咔嗒声，大门打开了。

example.ex: It gave a metallic clang, like a cracked bell.
example.tran: 它发出了金属碰击般的哐啷声，跟破钟似的。

entry.def: A metallic voice has a harsh unpleasant sound.

entry.tran: (涂料、颜色)有金属光泽的，金属般闪亮的
entry.def: Metallic paint or colours shine like metal.

example.ex: He had painted all the wood with metallic silver paint...
example.tran: 他给所有的木材都涂上了一层闪耀着金属光泽的银漆。

example.ex: Metallic finishes are seen as upmarket.
example.tran: 金属般闪亮的罩面漆被认为是高档漆。

entry.def: Something that tastes metallic has a bitter unpleasant taste.

example.ex: There was a metallic taste at the back of his throat.
example.tran: 他喉咙深处有一股金属味儿。

entry.def: Metallic means consisting entirely or partly of metal.

example.ex: Even the smallest metallic object, whether a nail file or cigarette lighter, is immediately confiscated...
example.tran: 即便是最小的金属物品，不管是指甲锉刀还是打火机，都会马上被没收。

example.ex: Place the salmon in a nonstick metallic dish.
example.tran: 将鲑鱼放在不粘底的金属盘内。

means.word_mean: 1. containing or made of or resembling or characteristic of a metal;

sentences.sentence: "the strange metallic note of the meadow lark, suggesting the clash of vibrant blades"- Ambrose Bierce

sentences.en: He picked up a metallic ring last night.
sentences.cn: 昨夜他捡了一个金属戒指。

sentences.en: The pair of lions which were found five years ago were metallic.
sentences.cn: 这对五年前发现的狮子是金属制的。

means.word_mean: 像金属的, 金属般的,有金属味（或声音）的

sentences.en: A sharp metallic note coming from the outside frightened me.
sentences.cn: 外面传来尖锐铿锵的声音吓了我一跳。

jushi.english: The chair has a metallic luster.
